cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) block.

cards.name: Hexguard
cards.description: Gain 11 (15) block and 1 Artifact for 1 turn.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Zombie Spit
cards.description: Deal 4 (5) damage and apply 1 (2) Decrepit.

cards.name: Atonement
cards.description:
Exhaust a random Status or Curse card in your draw pile.
Gain 7 (11) Block.

cards.name: Bewitch
cards.description:
Apply 1 (2) Weak and 1 (2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Black Bolt
cards.description: Deal 9 damage. Apply 2 (4) Weak if you have at least a Curse in hand.

cards.name: Black Shield
cards.description: Gain 7 (9) Block, doubled if you have at least a Curse in hand.

cards.name: Bleed Out
cards.description: ALL enemies lose 4 (7) health.

cards.name: Bone Carving
cards.description:
When drawn apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy 2 (3) times.
Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Broomstick
cards.description: Deal 8 (12) damage. If the target is Weak the damage is increased by 50% and apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Decrepify
cards.description: Apply 2 Decrepit to a random enemy X (+1) times.

cards.name: Demonfyre
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage. All Demonfyre cards deal 1 (2) additional damage this combat.
Recurrent.

cards.name: Gnarled Body
cards.description:
Costs 1 less for each card in hand.
Gain 10 (15) Block.

cards.name: Karma Drain
cards.description: Apply X Weak. Gain 4 (6) Block X times.

cards.name: Memento Mori
cards.description:
Deal 11 (16) damage, increased by the percentage of target's missing health.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mercury Wand
cards.description: If you have 0 block gain 9 (13) Block, otherwise deal 9 (13) damage.

cards.name: Roiling Barrier
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block. When drawn increase this card's Block by 1 (2).
Recurrent.

cards.name: Runic Fang
cards.description: Deal 4 (6) damage two times. Gain 4 (6) Block.

cards.name: Salt Circle
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 7 (10) Block.

cards.name: Skull Flask
cards.description:
When drawn gain 2 (4) Strength for 1 turn.
Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Soul Barrier
cards.description:
When drawn gain 3 (4) Block.
Gain 6 (8) Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Thundercloud
cards.description:
When drawn apply 1 Weak to a random enemy.
Deal 10 (13) damage to all Weak enemies.

cards.name: Wicked Thoughts
cards.description:
Retain.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards) for each curse in your hand.

cards.name: Wretched Nails
cards.description: Draw 1 (2) card (cards), then deal damage equal to the number of cards you have drawn this turn.

cards.name: 'Shrooms
cards.description: Draw 3 (4) cards. They have random costs for this turn.

cards.name: Athame
cards.description: Deal 8 (11) damage. If this kills the enemy, increase the chance of receiving rare cards by 10 (20)% and Exhaust this card.

cards.name: Baleful Ward
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) Block.
If your Block is broken this turn, add a copy of this card to your hand.

cards.name: Bat Familiar
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a (an)  (upgraded) Bat to your hand. Removes other Familiar powers.

cards.name: Cat Familiar
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a (an)  (upgraded) Cat to your hand. Removes other Familiar powers.

cards.name: Corrupt Blood
cards.description: If the enemy is Poisoned turn all Poison into Rot, otherwise apply 3 (5) Poison. Recurrent.

cards.name: Crystal Resonance
cards.description:
When drawn reduce by 1 the cost of all Skills in hand for this turn.
Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Cursed Blade
cards.description: Deal 13 (17) damage. Add a random Curse to your discard pile.

cards.name: Foresight
cards.description: Draw a card. If it's a Curse or a Status, exhaust it. Otherwise draw a copy of it. Exhaust.

cards.name: Ghoul Touch
cards.description: Deal 7 (10) damage, then enemy loses Strength for 1 turn equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Grim Vengeance
cards.description: When you are attacked apply 1 (2) Decrepit to the attacker.

cards.name: Harmlessness
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Cleanse: play 3 skills this turn.

cards.name: Ill Omen
cards.description: Shuffle a random Curse in your draw pile. The next time you draw a Curse deal 14 (18) damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

cards.name: Living Bomb
cards.description: Kill an enemy if it has 15 (20) HP or less. If successful, other enemies are dealt 12 (16) damage.

cards.name: Malady
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage and apply 2 (4) Rot.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mortus Claw
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 12 (17) damage, then the enemy loses 12 (17) HP.

cards.name: Nigh Invulnerability
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Cleanse: play 3 attacks this turn.

cards.name: Owl Familiar
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add an  (upgraded) Owl to your hand. Removes other Familiar powers.

cards.name: Pain Bolt
cards.description: Applies X Vulnerable, then deal 4 (6) multiplied by X damage.

cards.name: Pillage
cards.description: Remove up to 8 (13) Block from an enemy. Gain Block equal to the amount removed plus 5 (8).

cards.name: Plague Spreader
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Apply 1 Rot to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Puncture
cards.description:
Deal 1 damage 5 (7) times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rat Familiar
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a (an)  (upgraded) Rat to your hand. Removes other Familiar powers.

cards.name: Rite Of Winter
cards.description: Place any number of cards in your hand on top of your draw pile and gain 5 (8) Block for each of them.

cards.name: Rite of Autumn
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand and draw that many cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rite of Summer
cards.description: Discard any number of cards and deal 6 (9) damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

cards.name: Schadenfreude
cards.description: Whenever you apply a Debuff to an enemy gain 2 (3) block.

cards.name: Twisted Mind
cards.description: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, ALL enemies lose 3 (5) health.

cards.name: Blood Sabbath
cards.description: Deal 15 (20) damage and apply 4 (7) Decrepit to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Boline
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Deal 6 (9) damage. If this kills the enemy, obtain a random potion and Exhaust this card.

cards.name: Dark Procession
cards.description: At the start of your turn add a copy of the last played card to your hand.

cards.name: Delirium Form
cards.description: Whenever you play a non-zero Cost card, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Dire Shriek
cards.description:
When drawn deal 5 (7) damage to ALL enemies.
Deal 9 (11) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Eternal Thirst
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Cleanse: suffer at least 20 damage in this fight.

cards.name: Evil Eye
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Deals an additional 2 (3) damage for each Curse drawn this combat.

cards.name: Fatal Ray
cards.description: Can only be played if you have at least 7 cards in hand. Deal 25 (35) damage.

cards.name: Graveburst
cards.description: Retain. Deal damage to all enemies equal to twice the number of Attacks in your discard pile.

cards.name: Illusory Strength
cards.description: Gain 4 (6) Strength. Shuffle a Delusion of Strength in your draw pile.

cards.name: Impending Doom
cards.description: Deal 8 (11) damage. Next turn the enemy loses 8 (11) life.

cards.name: Intelligence
cards.description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 (2) random card (cards) from your discard pile~~- . -~~

cards.name: Moon Chosen
cards.description: Gain 1 (2) Artifact when your turn begins if you have none.

cards.name: Mystic Unburial
cards.description:
Draw a card from your (you) discard pile.  (That card costs 0 for this turn.)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Raven Familiar
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a (an)  (upgraded) Raven to your hand. Removes other Familiar powers.

cards.name: Rite of Spring
cards.description: Shuffle in your draw pile any number of cards in your hand and gain twice that much HP. Exhaust

cards.name: Strange Brew
cards.description: Apply on yourself the effect of all your drinkable potions, without consuming them. Exhaust

cards.name: Toad Familiar
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a (an)  (upgraded) Toad to your hand. Removes other Familiar powers.

cards.name: Troll's Blood
cards.description: Recover 1 health at the end of each turn in which you played at least an attack.

cards.name: Twitch
cards.description:
When drawn gain 2 (3) Dexterity for 1 turn.
Gain 14 (17) block.

cards.name: Unlucky Seven
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Cleanse: have your current health ending with 7.

cards.name: Unnatural Energy
cards.description:
Gain [B] ([B]).
Recurrent.

cards.name: Vile Egg
cards.description:
Heal 3 (5) HP.
Add a random  (upgraded) Familiar to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust

cards.name: Wall of Rust
cards.description: Gain 9 (14) block. Shuffle a Curse of Rust in your draw pile.

cards.name: Walpurgis Night
cards.description: Shuffle ALL Exhausted non-Etheral Attacks and Skills into your draw pile, then draw 1 (3) of those cards. Exhaust

relics.name: Black Cat
relics.description:
At the beginning of each combat choose 1 of 3 random
Curses to shuffle into your draw pile.
Gain [B] whenever you draw a Curse.

relics.name: Toy Horse
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a Basic card of any character to add to your deck.
relics.flavorText: It reminds you of your childhood.

relics.name: Pet Cage
relics.description: Add a random Familiar in your hand at the beginning of each turn.

relics.name: Walking Cane
relics.description: Weak, Vulnerable and Decrepit no longer decrease each turn.

relics.name: Scissors
relics.description: Whenever you add a rare card to your deck, remove a random Basic Strike or Defend.
relics.flavorText: Let's take just a couple inches off...

keywords.name: Cleanse
keywords.description: This card is cleansed if the condition is satisfied while in hand, turning into a powerful card for the rest of the combat.

keywords.name: Decrepit
keywords.description:
Creatures afflicted by Decrepit suffer 1 extra damage from attacks for each stack.
Each turn Decrepit is decreased by 1.

keywords.name: Recurrent
keywords.description: When this card is played it's shuffled in the draw pile instead of being discarded.

keywords.name: Rot
keywords.description: Creatures afflicted by Rot lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn Rot is increased by 1.
